> Ponyfill: A polyfill that doesn't overwrite the native method

## Install

```
$ npm install --save os-homedir
```


## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< .merge_file_yOoo0g
var osHomedir = require('os-homedir');

console.log(osHomedir());
//=> /Users/sindresorhus
=======
const osHomedir = require('os-homedir');

console.log(osHomedir());
//=> '/Users/sindresorhus'

```
